data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Ho, Hsuan-Ching, Motomura, Hiroyuki, Hata, Harutaka, Jiang, Wei-Chuan (2017): Review of the fish genus Epinnula Poey (Perciformes: Gempylidae), with description of a new species from the Pacific Ocean. Zootaxa 4363 (3): 393-408, DOI: https://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4363.3.5|12 occurrences
